episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: Superman tries to rescue Lois Lane and Jimmy Olsen from the fire at Little Falls.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Dinelli's Protection Racket, Part Four
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: Dinelli makes his escape at Perry White and Clark Kent arrive to search for Lois Lane.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Dinelli's Protection Racket, Part Three
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: Chip Dinelli kidnaps Lois Lane and warns she'll be harmed if the Planet prints a word about his extortion racket.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Dinelli's Protection Racket, Part Two
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: Superman rescues Jimmy Olsen and his mother from Dinelli's henchmen, but Dinelli's not done scheming.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Dinelli's Protection Racket, Part One
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: Superman sets out to teach a lesson to a petty extortionist who's extracting collection money from Jimmy Olsen's mother. Also, the first appearance of Jimmy Olsen.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: The Emerald of the Incas, Part Six
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: Superman and Dr. Beecham try to catch the incan priests before they escape in their sea plane.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Emerald of the Incas, Part Five
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: Superman takes up pursuit of the tribal priests who've stolen back the Emerald of the Incas.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Emerald of the Incas, Part Four
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: Dr. Beecham's daughter shows up alive and Dr. Beecham finally tells the secret of the Emerald of the Incas.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Emerald of the Incas, Part Three
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: Superman captures a cab driver trying to escape from the Beecham house, while Dr. Beecham is hit with a poison dart.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Emerald of the Incas, Part Two
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: Clark Kent finds Dr. Beechman, but does Kent's success doom them all?

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Emerald of the Incas, Part One
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: Clark Kent goes searching for a missing scientist.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Dam Waters Diverted from Direville
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: Can Superman stop the Yellow Mask from flooding out Direville.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Yellow Mask Will Blow Up Harley Dam
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: The Yellow Mask wants to blow up the Harley Dam, can Superman stop him?

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Superman Saves Jefferson Bridge
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: A barge breaks free from a train and threatens the Jefferson Street Bridge.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Wolfe v. Yellow Mask
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: The Wolfe faces off against the Yellow Mask as Clark Kent and Lois Lane head to dyersville to investigate some strange goings on.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Keno and Wolfe Head for Steam Plant With Lois
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: Keno and Wolfe take Lois Lane hostage as they attempt to complete their jail break. Can Superman stop them?

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Prison Riot with Keno and Wolfe
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: Lois Lane writes a story on a prison just as Keno and the Wolfe are planning a riot so they can escape.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Superman Saves June from Mine Explosion
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: The owners of the North Star Mining Company plan to get rid of June Anderson and Clark Kent once and for all.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Kent Falls Off Plane to Canyon City, Idaho
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: The papers needed to put the owners of the North Star Mining Company behind bars are recovered. Now Clark Kent and June Anderson and her brother must get to Idaho and stop the owners from destroying the mine.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Bart and Joe Set Fire on Steamer Madison
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: Unable to obtain their desired evidence, Joe and Bart set fire to the Steamboat Madison. Can Superman stop them?

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: North Star Mining Co./Jones Brothers Boat
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: Papers that will convict the owners of the North Star Mining Company are in a boat bound for Charleston, but will Superman be able to stop the villains from stealing the papers?

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Relative Stabs June Anderson in Hospital
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: Two mining executives disguise themselves as relatives of an unconscious fire survivor while Superman searches all cars leaving Metropolis to find the executives.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Fire in Sterling Building, Girl Trapped
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: Superman must rescue a girl trapped in a burning building without revealing his secret identity

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Yellow Mask Throws Lois Out of Plane
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: The Yellow Mask kidnaps Lois Lane and threats to drop her from his airplane should anyone get to too close.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Yellow Mask Steals Fuel for Atomic Beam
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: The Yellow Mask finds the machine he's stolen to destroy the Daily Planet with is totally useless and plots to steal fuel to bring about his evil plan.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Dr. Dalgrin's Atomic Beam Machine
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: The Yellow Mask has threatened the Daily Planet with destruction. His weapon of choice? An experimental atomic beam machine.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: The Yellow Mask
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: Superman races to rescue the Silver Clipper. But will capturing Keno and Wolfe be the beginning of Superman's troubles.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Locomotive Crew Freed
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: After gaining some necessary information from his captors, Superman escapes Wolfe and Keno. But will he be in time to save a train from disaster?

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Kent Captured by Wolfe
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: Clark Kent falls into the hands of the wolfe as he continues his search for the mysterious train saboteur.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: Keno's Landslide
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: Suoerman must stop an attempt to sabotage the Western Express as he continues his search for a man who has delivered a series of threats against America's railways.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Old Time Radio Superman Show
episodes.title: The Baby from Krypton/Clark Kent Reporter
episodes.author: Adam Graham
episodes.summary: The demise of Krypton and Superman becomes Clark Kent reporter.
